SEARCH
Package com.influxdb.client

Interface VariablesApi

@ThreadSafe public interface VariablesApi
The client of the InfluxDB 2.x that implement Variables HTTP API endpoint.
Author:
Jakub Bednar (27/03/2019 09:35)
